timeline.message: test: Make the testcontainers image persistent via variable.

build: Use an explicit version of liquibase.
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/6.0.0' into ps_db_id_fix
Fix: Change the id generation to use sequences.
Fix: Update tests to deal with ID generation.
Fix: Use single increment on ids for authentication_type table.
fix: Use identity types for meta-data tables.
build: Update the build number for testing.
fix: Add a component to read data from the database to initialize JPA.
fix: Remove environment variable override.
test: Add logging statements to confirm logic.
fix: Only release changelocks first when upgrading to 6.0.0.
fix: Remove the override environment variable if it exists.
fix: Change init script to be run multiple times without failing.

timeline.bodyText: If I recall correctly, we don't want to declare this because we are not maintaining multiple versions of the same java objects. You should be able to turn off the warning and generation of this from your Intellij settings.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I will disable it and fix the files I changed that added it.
replies.author: psantos1113

timeline.author: gkillough
gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Do we perform bulk inserts on this table? We might be able to get away with IDENTITY here.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: Do we perform bulk inserts here? I would assume we do for provider_users, but I'm surprised about this one.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: This is another table that I'm surprised we perform bulk inserts on.
timeline.author: gkillough

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if there's a way to just get the transaction manager or persistence manager and flush at the top level.
timeline.author: gkillough

replies.bodyText: I think there is a different way to define and setup testcontainers with the tests that need a database to provide a clean instance with each test.  I would like to revisit this because I think we can do better.
replies.author: psantos1113

replies.bodyText: There is, but the performance hit is extremely costly. We do it in jira-service integration tests and it adds significant overhead.
replies.author: gkillough

timeline.message: refactor: Remove serialVersionId based on PR feedback.
refactor: Add '_generator' suffix to sequence name.
refactor: Use Identity generation for additional tables.
